column5: Update
Phase II/III rules: completed. Being posted for comments.
NY EDI Working Group being formed. First meeting August 22.
Phase I testing has started.
Coordination with EES and CSC to plan for Phase II/III testing.
PIWG:  Pilot opened 8/01 (Ramp-up/Back-log)
RMS:  Multiple Market Issues
TX SET:  Continued development of standardized electronic transactions
Submitted a joint marketer proposal last week
Working on fundamental questions
Stipulation now filed with the commission
Participated in the OSPO discussion on this issue
Planning the meeting and agenda
Working on draft Enron Direct contract with legal
Reviewing Reliant's filings for grounds to file complaint
Working with EES to determine possible pilot participation in TXU and Reliant
Working with EES Tax Department to understand Tax implications
Meeting with ComEd to go over the agreements
Setting up meeting with ComEd and IP to review Operations
Meeting 7/23.  Report at 8/14 GISB/DOE Industry meeting - support but slow moving
